short_desc: This program is to help employees that lost their job at the NUMMI Plant in Fremont or who have been affected by the shift in production from U.S to Canada or Mexico
description: This program is to help employees that lost their job at the NUMMI Plant in Fremont or who have been affected by the shift in production from U.S to Canada or Mexico.  The Trade Adjustment Act will be implemented by TAA Specialists located at 3 locations: Hayward, Oakland, and Fremont.
